div.p:
The Governor has announced that all schools in Massachusetts will remain closed and continue with a distance learning model for the remainder of the school year.
The District Administration Office is also closed. If you have any questions, please contact us online.
COVID-19 Resources and Updates | WPS Continuation of Learning Website

p.br: Please email wpstechsupport@westwood.k12.ma.us if you or your child are having difficulty accessing learning resources, experiencing hardware issues with a school-issued Chromebook, or any other issue that is preventing your child from learning in a remote setting. We will do our best to resolve your issue as expediently as possible.

div.p: The Westwood Public Schools are actively shaping the future while honoring a strong tradition of excellence.

img.alt: Students listening to the coach during a basketball game

div.p: Members of the Westwood Public School community strive for excellence in academic, co-curricular, and professional endeavors.
Our students develop into self-motivated learners and achieve their potential in supportive and creative environments.

img.alt: Student and teacher learning about planets

div.p: Through innovative collaboration and partnerships, the Westwood Public Schools expand opportunities and resources that benefit the schools and the community.

img.alt: Principle and student in a Thurston Middle School engineering class

div.a: For updates about Coronavirus mitigation efforts, please click here to visit our COVID-19 page.

li.p: The School Committee approved a revised school calendar on April 10, 2020.
The 2020-2021 school calendar has been approved by the School Committee.
Use to request space in any of the Westwood Public School buildings.

img.alt: Emily J. Parks Superintendent Westwood Public Schools
img.style: width: 130px; height: 172px; float: right; margin-right: 10px; margin-left: 10px;

br.img: Welcome to the Westwood Public Schools, a school community committed to both challenging and supporting all students! Whether you are looking for information about our curriculum and programs, news of upcoming or recent events, or contact information for our teachers and administrators, I hope that this website will be a valuable resource for learning about our district and staying connected to our schools.

span.p: I also encourage you to follow us on social media through channels such as:

span.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 14.6666669845581px; line-height: 20.2399997711182px; text-indent: 48px; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 14.6666669845581px; line-height: 20.2399997711182px; text-indent: 48px; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 14.6666669845581px; line-height: 20.2399997711182px; text-indent: 48px; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Arial; font-size: 14.6666669845581px; line-height: 20.2399997711182px; text-indent: 48px; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 14.6667px; font-family: Arial; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.br: Finally, I invite you to contact me directly if you have a question, concern, or feedback. I can be reached by phone at 781-326-7500 x1341 or via e-mail at eparks@westwood.k12.ma.us. I welcome and value your engagement.

div.p: Copyright 2020 Westwood Public SchoolPrivacy | Terms of use | Link to Town Site
